item.title: How to change d claws. [IMPORTANT PLEASE HELP!] [377]
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:14, topic:303376”]ok, search for this

"dragon"

And it should look something like

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 60; }

Now, ABOVE that, add this

} else if (ItemName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dragon claws")) { return 1;[/quote]
That wouldn’t work.

item.title: How to change d claws. [IMPORTANT PLEASE HELP!] [377]
item.dc:creator: @use_are_client use are client
item.description:
@use_are_client wrote:

[quote=“bloodmaniet, post:11, topic:303376”][quote author=use are client link=topic=399701.msg2964290#msg2964290 date=1253458264]
how do i make d claws 60 atk?
insteda 60 def?
ty,

use are client
[/quote]

Ok u go to wearing.java and search in this…

		} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) {
			return 60;

make another the exact same below that code… and add this…

		} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon claws")) {
			return 1;

it works bc i just tested on my server and it works… i also made a tut on how u could add them too if u would want me to post…[/quote]
i tried to find it fucking didn’t this is pissing me the fuck off now fucking bull shit.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change d claws. [IMPORTANT PLEASE HELP!] [377]

item.title: How to change d claws. [IMPORTANT PLEASE HELP!] [377]
item.dc:creator: @bloodmaniet bloodmaniet
item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

[quote=“use are client, post:1, topic:303376”]how do i make d claws 60 atk?
insteda 60 def?
ty,

use are client[/quote]

Ok u go to wearing.java and search in this…

		} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) {
			return 60;

make another the exact same below that code… and add this…

		} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon claws")) {
			return 1;

it works bc i just tested on my server and it works… i also made a tut on how u could add them too if u would want me to post…

Read full topic
